TowerDefense

Class Waypoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • TowerDefense.Waypoint

  • public class Waypoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Waypoints are locations on the grid, and can be used to create a path. These Waypoints are used to create a path for the Walkers to follow. The path should lead them to the Queen. It is possible to make branching paths. NOTE: I don't believe the current version of the HTL game uses Waypoints, but they're here if you want them.
    Author:
    Branden Drake, Rachel Horton

    • Method Detail

      • getNextWaypoint

        public Waypoint getNextWaypoint()
        From the list of possible waypoints to send units to after this one, selects one at random and returns it.
        Returns:
        the next waypoint the unit should head towards, or null if this is the last one

      • collidedWithWaypoint

        public boolean collidedWithWaypoint(Engine.GameObject object)
        Is the object center basically overlapping with the waypoint center?
        Parameters:
        object - The other GameObject.
        Returns:
        True if they have collided.
